Posts.Content: I found out in July 2013 that now my cancer has gone to my bones liver and lungs. I was told Christmas was unlikely but since my lung tumours have shrunk and liver tumour has stabilised. I'm having the chemotherapy treatment FEC-T palliatively every 3 weeks through PICC Line. I have up and down days and have been in need of more support round the house lately so I have had carers coming in as basic things are becoming difficult. Thanks for reading. EDIE D.
Posts.Title: Breast cancer with lung liver and bones secondaries
